name: Resident Evil: Leon Kennedy's Grand Slam
name_original: Resident Evil: Leon Kennedy's Grand Slam
description:
Leon Kennedy has been striving for the meal of meals. One just might be around the corner.

This experience was made in free time within a few weeks. It is a parody and I will not recieve any payment from it. It is about 10 minutes long.

HD Cutscenes and Soundtrack playlist available here (contains spoilers!)
